Package ki306.yarema.lab7

Class Book

java.lang.Object
ki306.yarema.lab7.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Item>, Item
public class Book extends Object implements Item
The Book class represents a book item that implements the Item interface. It has a name and a weight, and it can be used for reading.

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Item item)
      Compares this book's weight to the weight of another item that implements the Item interface.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Item>
      Parameters:
      item - The item to compare to.
      Returns:
      A negative integer if this book is lighter, a positive integer if it's heavier, or 0 if they have the same weight.
